variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.service 
| filterOut matchesPhrase(entity.name, "background") or matchesPhrase(entity.name, "SpringBoot")  or contains(entity.name, "Health")
| fields service = entity.name
| sort service, direction:"ascending"
| summarize distinctServices = collectDistinct(service)
| fields values = arrayRemoveNulls(array("ALL", distinctServices))

0.title: Saturation - Process Memory Usage %
0.query:
timeseries usage=avg(dt.process.memory.usage),
    by:{dt.entity.process_group_instance}
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance | fields id, serviceId=runs[dt.entity.service], belongs_to], sourceField:dt.entity.process_group_instance, lookupField:id
| filter isNotNull(lookup.serviceId)
| expand lookup.serviceId
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.service | fields id, entity.name], sourceField:lookup.serviceId, lookupField:id
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(lookup.entity.name, $Service)
| sort arrayAvg(usage) desc
| limit 20
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance],sourceField:dt.entity.process_group_instance,lookupField:id,fields:{dt.entity.process_group_instance.name=entity.name}
| fields timeframe, interval, dt.entity.process_group_instance.name, usage
| sort usage desc

1.title: Saturation - Process CPU Usage %

7.title: Traffic - Requests

8.title: Errors - Requests

9.title: Latency - Requests

11.title: ðŸš¦ Problems - Last 7 days
11.query:
fetch events, from: now()-7d
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| sort timestamp desc
| expand affected_entity_ids
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.service | fields name=entity.name, id=id, namespace=belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace]], 
         sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField:id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.service"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.service], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.services"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.service], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.services"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.pgi"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.pgi"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.application], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.applications"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.application], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.applications"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.mobile_application], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.mobile"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.mobile_application], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.mobile"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.custom_application], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.customapplication"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.custom_application], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.customapplication"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.cloud_application], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.cloudapplication"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.cloud_application], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.cloudapplication"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.synthetic_test], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.synthetictest"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.synthetic_test], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.synthetictest"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.http_check], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.httpcheck"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.http_check], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.httpcheck"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.kubernetescluster"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.kubernetescluster"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.host], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.hosts"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.host], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.hosts"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.custom_device], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.customdevices"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.custom_device], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.customdevices"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.hypervisor], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.hypervisor"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.hypervisor], sourceField:root_cause_entity_id, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.rootcause.entity.hypervisor"
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.environment], sourceField:affected_entity_ids, lookupField: id, prefix:"lookup.affected.entity.environment"
// Lookup for affected_entity_ids and root_cause_entity_id End

// Summarzation Start - Group Probem Events by Problem ID
| summarize {startTime = takeFirst(event.start),
            endTime = takeFirst(event.end),
            problemClosedDuration = takeFirst(resolved_problem_duration),
            status = takeFirst(event.status),
            event.name = takeFirst(event.name),
            severityLevel = takeFirst(event.category),
            affected = takeFirst(affected_entity_ids),
            rootCause = takeFirst(root_cause_entity_id),
            dt.davis.is_duplicate = takeFirst(dt.davis.is_duplicate),
            affectedServices = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.servicesentity.name),
            affectedPGI = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.pgientity.name),
            affectedApplications = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.applicationsentity.name),
            affectedMobile = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.mobileentity.name),
            affectedCustomApplication = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.customapplicationentity.name),
            affectedCloudApplication = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.cloudapplicationentity.name),
            affectedSyntheticTest = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.synthetictestentity.name),
            affectedHttpCheck = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.httpcheckentity.name),
            affectedKubernetesCluster = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.kubernetesclusterentity.name),
            affectedHosts = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.hostsentity.name),
            affectedCustomDevices = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.customdevicesentity.name),
            affectedHypervisor = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.hypervisorentity.name),
            affectedEnvironment = collectDistinct(lookup.affected.entity.environmententity.name),
            rootCauseServices = collectDistinct(lookup.rootcause.entity.servicesentity.name),
            rootCausePGI = collectDistinct(lookup.rootcause.entity.pgientity.name),
            rootCauseApplications = collectDistinct(lookup.rootcause.entity.applicationsentity.name),
            rootCauseMobile = collectDistinct(lookup.rootcause.entity.mobileentity.name),
            rootCauseCustomApplication = collectDistinct(lookup.rootcause.entity.customapplicationentity.name),
            rootCauseSyntheticTest = collectDistinct(lookup.rootcause.entity.synthetictestentity.name),
            rootCauseHttpCheck = collectDistinct(lookup.rootcause.entity.httpcheckentity.name),
            rootCauseHosts = collectDistinct(lookup.rootcause.entity.hostsentity.name),
            rootCauseCustomDevices = collectDistinct(lookup.rootcause.entity.customdevicesentity.name),
            event.id = takeFirst(event.id)}, 
            by:{display_id}
| filter `dt.davis.is_duplicate` == false
| fieldsAdd currentTime = toTimestamp(now())
| fieldsAdd status = if((status == "ACTIVE"),"OPEN", 
                else:if((status == "CLOSED"), "CLOSED"))
// Summarzation End - Group Probem Events by Problem ID


// Final Result Start
| fields Status = if((status == "OPEN"),"ðŸ”´ OPEN", 
                  else:if((status == "CLOSED"),"ðŸŸ¢ CLOSED")),
         Type = (event.name),
         SeverityLevel = severityLevel,
         Description = concat(display_id," - ",event.name),         
         AffectedCount = arraySize(arrayRemoveNulls(arrayConcat(affectedApplications,affectedMobile,affectedCustomApplication,affectedCloudApplication,affectedSyntheticTest,affectedHttpCheck,affectedServices,affectedPGI,affectedKubernetesCluster,affectedHosts,affectedHypervisor,affectedCustomDevices,affectedEnvironment))),
         Affected = arrayRemoveNulls(arrayConcat(affectedApplications,affectedMobile,affectedCustomApplication,affectedCloudApplication,affectedSyntheticTest,affectedHttpCheck,affectedServices,affectedPGI,affectedKubernetesCluster,affectedHosts,affectedHypervisor,affectedCustomDevices,affectedEnvironment)),
         RootCause = arrayRemoveNulls(arrayConcat(rootCauseServices,rootCauseHosts)),
         StartTime = startTime,
         EndTime =  if((status == "OPEN"),"In Progress", 
                    else:if((status == "CLOSED"),endTime)),   
      //   Duration = if((status == "CLOSED"),problemClosedDuration,
      //              else:if((status == "OPEN"), currentTime-startTime)),

         `Duration (min)` = if((status == "CLOSED"),problemClosedDuration,
                   else:if((status == "OPEN"), toDuration(currentTime-startTime))),
         event.id           
| sort StartTime, direction:"descending"
| sort Status, direction:"ascending"
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(Affected, $Service)
// Final Result End

12.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == true
| filter isNotNull(endpoint.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service ], 
         lookupField:id, sourceField:dt.entity.service, 
         fields: {service = entity.name}
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(service, $Service)
| summarize count = count()

13.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == true
| filter isNotNull(endpoint.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service ], 
         lookupField:id, sourceField:dt.entity.service, 
         fields: {service = entity.name}
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(service, $Service)
| summarize latency = avg(toDouble(duration))

15.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == true
//| filter dt.security_context == "EKS"
| filter isNotNull(endpoint.name)
| filter dt.internal.is_failed == true or request.is_failed == true
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service ], 
         lookupField:id, sourceField:dt.entity.service, 
         fields: {service = entity.name}
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(service, $Service)
| fieldsAdd grpcError = if(rpc.protocol == "grpc", span.events[][exception.message])
| parse toString(grpcError), "DATA 'rpc error: code = Code(' LD:grpcErrorCode ')'"
| fieldsAdd ResponseCode = toLong(coalesce(toString(grpcErrorCode),toString(http.response.status_code)))
//| fieldsAdd ResponseCode = toLong(http.response.status_code)
| filter ResponseCode >= 500 and ResponseCode < 600 
| summarize Errors = count()

19.query:
fetch logs
| filter request.is_root_span == true
//| filter dt.security_context == "EKS"
| filter loglevel == "ERROR" or loglevel == "SEVERE" or matchesPhrase(content, "error")
| filterOut matchesValue(k8s.deployment.name, "otelcollectorservice-*")
| filterOut isNull(trace_id)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance     
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id, mz=managementZones, si = runs[dt.entity.service_instance]],
           sourceField:dt.entity.process_group_instance, lookupField:id, prefix:"lookup.pgi_"
| filterOut isNull(lookup.pgi_si)
| expand lookup.pgi_si
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service_instance
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id, servicename =instance_of[dt.entity.service]], 
           sourceField:lookup.pgi_si, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.si_"
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:lookup.si_servicename, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.service_"
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(lookup.service_name, $Service)
//| filter ("ALL" == $Service OR $Service ==  toString(lookup.service_name))
| filterOut matchesPhrase(lookup.service_name, "background") | filterOut matchesPhrase(lookup.service_name, "background") or matchesPhrase(lookup.service_name, "health")
| summarize `Log Errors` = count()

26.title: Errors - Logs
26.query:
fetch logs
//| filter dt.security_context == "EKS"
| filter loglevel == "ERROR" or loglevel == "SEVERE" or matchesPhrase(content, "error")
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance     
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id, mz=managementZones, si = runs[dt.entity.service_instance]],
           sourceField:dt.entity.process_group_instance, lookupField:id, prefix:"lookup.pgi_"
| filterOut isNull(lookup.pgi_si)
| expand lookup.pgi_si
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service_instance
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id, servicename =instance_of[dt.entity.service]], 
           sourceField:lookup.pgi_si, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.si_"
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:lookup.si_servicename, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.service_"
| filterOut matchesPhrase(lookup.service_name, "background") | filterOut matchesPhrase(lookup.service_name, "background") or matchesPhrase(lookup.service_name, "health")
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(lookup.service_name, $Service)
| fields timestamp, Service = lookup.service_name, Process = dt.process.name, trace_id, content
| makeTimeseries  `Log Errors` = count(), by:{Process}

30.title: Top 10 Most Frequent Requests

31.title: Top 10 Slowest Requests
31.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == true
| filter isNotNull(endpoint.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service ], 
         lookupField:id, sourceField:dt.entity.service, 
         fields: {service = entity.name}
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(service, $Service)
| summarize {LatencyMedian = median(duration),
             Count = count(),
             Errors = countIf(dt.internal.is_failed == true)}, 
             by: {Service = service,Request = endpoint.name}
//| fieldsAdd Service_Request = concat(Service, " - ", Request)
//| fields Service_Request, Count,Latency,  Errors
| sort LatencyMedian desc
| limit 10

32.title: Top 10 Requests with Errors
32.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == true
| filter dt.internal.is_failed == true or request.is_failed == true 
| filter isNotNull(endpoint.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service ], 
         lookupField:id, sourceField:dt.entity.service, 
         fields: {service = entity.name}
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(service, $Service)
| fieldsAdd grpcError = if(rpc.protocol == "grpc", span.events[][exception.message])
| parse toString(grpcError), "DATA 'rpc error: code = Code(' LD:grpcErrorCode ')'"
//| fieldsAdd grpcErrorCode = if(isNotNull(grpcErrorCode), grpcErrorCode, else:toString(grpcError))
| fieldsAdd ResponseCode = coalesce(toString(grpcErrorCode),toString(http.response.status_code))
//| filter ResponseCode == 400 or (ResponseCode >= 500 and ResponseCode < 600) 
| summarize {Count = count(),
             Latency = median(duration)}, 
             by: {Service = service,Request = endpoint.name, ResponseCode}
//| filterOut isNull(ResponseCode)
| fields Service, Request, ResponseCode = toLong(ResponseCode), Count, Latency
| sort Count desc
| limit 10

34.content: ###  ðŸŒ Service Request Analytics - Requests, Latency, Errors & Exceptions

41.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == TRUE
//| filter dt.security_context == "EKS"
//| filter matchesValue(dt.entity.host_group, "HOST_GROUP-BA452F1AC26125E2")
| filter isNotNull(endpoint.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service ], 
         lookupField:id, sourceField:dt.entity.service, 
         fields: {service = entity.name}
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(service, $Service)
| summarize  FailureRate = avg(if(request.is_failed == true, 100, else: 0))
| fieldsAdd SLO = toDouble(100-FailureRate)
| fieldsRemove FailureRate

43.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == true
//| filter dt.security_context == "EKS"
//| filter matchesValue(dt.entity.host_group, "HOST_GROUP-BA452F1AC26125E2")
| filter isNotNull(endpoint.name)
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service ], 
         lookupField:id, sourceField:dt.entity.service, 
         fields: {service = entity.name}
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(service, $Service)
| fieldsAdd SlowRequest = if(toLong(duration) > 2000000000, "Slow", else:"Fast")
| summarize SlowRequestRate = avg(if(SlowRequest == "Slow", 100, else: 0))
| fieldsAdd SLO = toDouble(100-SlowRequestRate)
| fieldsRemove SlowRequestRate

45.title: Top 10 Exceptions

48.title: ðŸ”Ž Log Analytics - Errors
48.query:
fetch logs
| filter loglevel == "ERROR" or loglevel == "SEVERE" //or matchesPhrase(content, "error")
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance     
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id, mz=managementZones, si = runs[dt.entity.service_instance]],
           sourceField:dt.entity.process_group_instance, lookupField:id, prefix:"lookup.pgi_"
| expand lookup.pgi_si
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service_instance
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id, servicename =instance_of[dt.entity.service]], 
           sourceField:lookup.pgi_si, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.si_"
| lookup [ fetch dt.entity.service
         | fields name=entity.name, id=id], 
           sourceField:lookup.si_servicename, lookupField:id ,prefix:"lookup.service_"
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(lookup.service_name, $Service)
//| filter ("ALL" == $Service OR $Service ==  toString(lookup.service_name))
| filterOut matchesPhrase(lookup.service_name, "background") or matchesPhrase(lookup.service_name, "health")
| fields Loglevel = concat("ðŸ”´"," ",loglevel),
         Timestamp = timestamp, 
         Service = lookup.service_name, 
         Process = dt.process.name, 
         trace_id,
         Content = content
//| fields timestamp, Process = dt.process.name, trace_id, content
| sort Timestamp desc
| limit 100

51.title: ðŸ” Open Vulnerabilities - High & Critical
51.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket=="default_security_events"
| filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
//| filter matchesValue(vulnerability.risk.level, "HIGH") or matchesValue(vulnerability.risk.level, "CRITICAL")
| filter event.level=="ENTITY"
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(related_entities.services.names, $Service)
// get latest snapshot
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| expand related_entities.services.names
| summarize {
  vulnerability.risk.level = takeFirst(vulnerability.risk.level),
  vulnerability.parent.mute.status = takeFirst(vulnerability.parent.mute.status),
  vulnerability.mute.status = takeFirst(vulnerability.mute.status),
  vulnerability.resolution.status = takeFirst(vulnerability.resolution.status),
  vulnerability.description = takeFirst(vulnerability.description),
  vulnerability.affected_entity.name = collectDistinct(related_entities.services.names),
  vulnerability.affected_processes = collectDistinct(affected_entity.name)},
  by: {vulnerability.id,event.description}
 // end of get latest snapshot
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| filter vulnerability.parent.mute.status != "MUTED" AND vulnerability.mute.status != "MUTED"
| fields Status = "ðŸ”´ OPEN", 
         RiskLevel = vulnerability.risk.level, 
         Description = event.description, 
         Details = toString(vulnerability.description),
         AffectedServices = arrayRemoveNulls(asArray(vulnerability.affected_entity.name)),
         AffectedProccesses = arrayRemoveNulls(asArray(vulnerability.affected_processes)),
         vulnerability.id
| filter in($Service , "ALL") OR in(AffectedServices, $Service)

//| summarize total=arraySize(collectDistinct(vulnerability.id))
// | fields `Open vulnerabilities` = coalesce(total, 0)
